rows.field_1878810: Focuses on optimizing the mobile app to improve user experience and increase engagement. It includes enhancements such as performance improvements, UI/UX enhancements, and new features tailored specifically for mobile users

Involves integrating a new payment gateway into the platform to provide users with additional payment options and improve transaction security. It includes tasks such as API integration, testing, and compliance with payment industry standards.

Aims to implement content personalization features to deliver more relevant and targeted content to users based on their preferences, behavior, and demographics. It includes tasks such as user segmentation, recommendation algorithms, and content customization options.

Involves integrating social media functionality into the platform to allow users to share content, interact with each other, and sign in using social media credentials. It includes tasks such as OAuth integration, sharing buttons, and social media analytics integration.

rows.field_1878815: Implement optimizations to enhance app performance
Update app interface for improved user experience
Enhance checkout process with multiple payment methods
Implement recommendation engine for personalized content
Enable users to customize content feeds
Allow users to sign in via social media accounts
Add social sharing buttons to content
Integrate analytics tools for social media tracking

fields.name: Story correct
fields.formula: and(and(contains(field('Story'),'As a'),contains(field('Story'),'I want ')),contains(field('Story'),'so that I can'))
